statements: DELETE FROM website_traffic_reports WHERE user_id = 100 AND user_age > 25;
DELETE FROM website_traffic_reports WHERE user_age > 30 AND user_gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM website_traffic_sources WHERE source_id = 1 AND last_visited < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM user_traffic_data WHERE user_id = 5 AND traffic_source_id = 3;
DELETE FROM page_views WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
